Posts.Content: Oh, Radha, Thank you so much! I know this has been a lot of work. I have a terrible time sometimes trying to figure out what's really meant by some of the acronyms we use. I frequently open a Google tab and try to figure it out, but most of the time Google has no idea. Even the medical terms we use are problematic for this old lady! Thanks again, Sharon-51
Posts.Title: YOU made an Inspire glossary!
